name: The Hidden Agenda
description: Secretly working to advance the goals of their faction at any cost.

name: The Forbidden Knowledge
description: Seeking to uncover and harness the power of ancient and dangerous artifacts.

name: The Lost Love
description: Driven by the desire to find or reunite with a lost love from their past.

name: The Redemption Seeker
description: Striving to atone for past mistakes and find a path to redemption.

name: The Double Agent
description: Covertly working for a rival faction while maintaining their cover within their own guild.
